Message:
If I’d only come back sooner,
I could’ve saved
the chief and the others.
If I was just...a little faster...!

As I was overcome with regret
from my own powerlessness,
the remaining villagers
gently comforted me.

“They may be gone,
but the fact that
we’re still alive is
all thanks to you, Milla.”

“The food you brought back
that day was so warm and tasty,
it brought me back to my senses.”
I began to tear up at their words.

Bringing the bowl of soup
I’d been gently handed to my lips,
I slowly took a sip.

As tears flowed down my cheeks,
I felt myself break into a smile.

Even though peace has
returned to the world,
tragedy still remains.

But, there are things that can
pull us out from the darkness.

Warm, delicious meals that
soothe one’s body and heart!

I know the difference
it makes is small.
But, when our bodies
and hearts become full,
the peaceful world
we wished for will finally begin.

So, I’ll work hard for the day
I can finally welcome
a warm world full of
satisfied bellies and hearts—!
